vehicle module

class vehicle.Vehicle(entryTime, exitTime, totalWait)[source]

Bases: object

Description: the object for the vehicles

entryTime

the time that the vehicle entered the simulation

Type:

float

exitTime

the time that the vehicle left the simulation

Type:

float

totalWait

the time that the vehicle had to wait

Type:

float
